episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_0300_:
I agree... Is it because they gained energy from
the sun?
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_0400_: Let’s battle again when the moon comes out!
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_0900_: It reminds of the time Nebby evolved...
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_1000_:
Maybe Eevee evolve by receiving mysterious
powers from the sun and the moon.
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_1100_:
By the way... Where did you two meet Espeon
and Umbreon?
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_1200_:
We met them near Paniola Town on Akala Island
when they were still Eevee!
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_1300_:
They evolved while we were taking on the
island challenge!
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_1400_:
Ahhh, Paniola Town... When I close my eyes, it all
comes back to me...
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_1500_: I can hear the Tauros now...
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_1800_:
There’s a ranch near Paniola Town that raises a
bunch of them.
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_1900_: Oh! The sun’s starting to set! It’s almost nighttime!
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_2000_: Ooh! I wonder if the moon will come out!
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_2100_: Selene! Lillie! Let’s definitely win this time!
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_2300_:
We’ll put in our all too, even without the
sun’s powers!
episode_event_eevee_2023/4001_1001_2400_:
That’s right! Let’s show them that we can still
shine brightly!
episode_event_eevee_2023/6801_1001_0200_: I wonder how they feel to Eevee?
